content.prompt: Which of the following describes a continuous variable?

choices.label: The number of items sold at a craft booth for one day
The number of apps downloaded from a website one day
The diameters of the tree trunks at an evergreen farm
The number of baskets made by a basketball player
The shoe sizes of all shoes on sale at a department store

topic.text: 1.5: Representing a Quantitative Variable with Graphs

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
